entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Richibucto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
